posts.content:
Hello experts!

I'm actually brand new to NWN and D&D on the whole, so I understand effectively nothing. I'm puttering around in a Drow cleric right now designed as a caster. And not doing toooooo badly. But I'd like a Wizard I think.

I'd like to ensure my summons are strong, so I can have my familiar then a second minion to do my bidding.
The idea here is that if the event came to it where I needed to take out another player, I'd have the ability.
And I suppose the issue creeps in where I'm limited to level 28, as Amia has a level 30 limit, and Drow are ECL+2


If you need any further info I'd be happy to provide it


Cheers,

Olly
